########### CMakeMaker autogenerated file ###########
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.6)



set(cpp_files
  ./source/csv_reader.cc
  ./source/main.cc
  ./source/scrum_printer.cc
  ./source/data_frame.cc
  ./source/graph_maker.cc
  ./source/scrum_printer.h
  ./source/data_frame.h
  ./source/csv_reader.h
  ./source/graph_maker.h
  ./test/test_parser.h
)

source_group(test FILES
  ./test/test_parser.h
)

source_group(source FILES
  ./source/csv_reader.cc
  ./source/main.cc
  ./source/scrum_printer.cc
  ./source/data_frame.cc
  ./source/graph_maker.cc
  ./source/scrum_printer.h
  ./source/data_frame.h
  ./source/csv_reader.h
  ./source/graph_maker.h
)

source_group(assets FILES
)

add_executable(scrum_statistics ${cpp_files})

include_directories(scrum_statistics
  ./assets
  ./source
  ./test
)

target_link_libraries(scrum_statistics
)

add_dependencies(scrum_statistics ALL_PRE_BUILD)
